title.en: Bayesian Optimization for Perovskite Composition Search
title.zh-Hans: 钙钛矿组分搜索的贝叶斯优化

summary.en: Using GNN-guided Bayesian optimization to efficiently search the perovskite composition space for stable, high-bandgap candidates.
summary.zh-Hans: 使用GNN引导的贝叶斯优化高效搜索钙钛矿组分空间，寻找稳定的高带隙候选材料。

hypothesis.en: GNN-surrogate Bayesian optimization finds top-10% stable compositions in fewer than 50 evaluations, compared to 500+ for random search.
hypothesis.zh-Hans: GNN代理贝叶斯优化在少于50次评估中找到前10%稳定组分，而随机搜索需要500+次。

protocol.en:
1. Define composition space: A(Cs,MA,FA) B(Pb,Sn) X(I,Br,Cl)
2. Use CrystalGNN as surrogate model
3. Run BO with Expected Improvement acquisition
4. Validate top candidates with DFT
protocol.zh-Hans:
1. 定义组分空间：A(Cs,MA,FA) B(Pb,Sn) X(I,Br,Cl)
2. 使用CrystalGNN作为代理模型
3. 使用期望改进采集函数运行BO
4. 用DFT验证最佳候选
